title: What are the biggest money pits in your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have been buying a new corvette every 3 to 4 years since 2000. My 2018 is now driven only on weekends. It is a great deal of money to spend on a car that is driven far less than 100 miles a week. I did not have the money to drive one in my early 20’s. I am over compensating for my age.

Not necessarily in any order, but for most folks there 3 areas where most folks most of their money are listed below. Lodging/rent/house/shelterfoodTransportationLive with parents or relatives when you are young. Do not buy food or drink from any place other than a grocery & cook your own meals. Never take out a loan for any depreciable object like a car, motorcycle, etc.
